misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the green, hails from the prestigious Helsingin Golfklubi. Beyond his golfing talents, Olli moonlights as a professional model, showcasing a versatility that few can match.
With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli's experience is undeniable. Olli is still actively participating in Hector events and his eighth appearance is coming up in 2025.

Known for his intimidating presence and reputed wrestling skills, few players dare to challenge Olli, making him a respected and somewhat feared competitor in the field. While the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Olli's determination suggests that his quest for victory is far from over.
